bg.x2d
Class ImageUtils

java.lang.Object
  bg.x2d.ImageUtils

public class ImageUtils
extends Object

Provides static convenience methods for performing geometric operations on images.

Since:
2DX 1.0 (1st Edition)
Author:
Brian

scaleImage

public static AffineTransform scaleImage(Image img,
                                         Point location,
                                         Dimension newSize)
Performs a AffineTransform scaling operation relative to the generic Image provided. The returned AffineTransform can be used to draw a scaled version of the Image on screen. High quality is not guaranteed.

Parameters:
img - The Image to be scaled.
location - The location the Image should be drawn at.
newSize - The dimensions the scaled Image should be.
Returns:
a scaled and translated AffineTransform that can be used to draw a scaled version of the Image.

scaleImage

public static Image scaleImage(Image img,
                               Dimension newSize)
Takes any generic Image and scales it to a new size. The returned Image is a casted BufferedImage upon which the scaled image is drawn upon. This method calls upon the Image class's getScaledInstance(...) method to scale the passed Image object. Smooth scaling is used and the BufferedImage created is of TYPE_INT_ARGB.

Parameters:
img - Any generic Image or Image subclass to be scaled (result image may not be castable).
newSize - the dimensions for the new Image.
Returns:
an Image casted from a BufferedImage object.

scaleBufferedImage

public static BufferedImage scaleBufferedImage(BufferedImage bi,
                                               Dimension newSize,
                                               int imgType,
                                               int scaleMode)
